question.questionText: Explain why you got a voltage reading of 1.5 for terminal 1 and terminal 6.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Terminals 1 and 6 are separated by the gap
Terminals 1 and 6 are not connected and so in different electrical states
There is a gap between terminals 1 and 6
Terminals 1 and 6 are in different electrical states

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: terminal 6 is conncected to the positive terminal of the battery and terminal 1 is connected to the negative terminal of the battery
terminal 6 is not connected to the negative terminal
there is a separation between them
Terminal 1 is not connected to terminal 1
they are not connected, there is a gap
Terminal 1 and terminal 6 are separated by a gap.
